description: Phone model with hover and rotation animation

params.code:
import bpy
obj = bpy.data.objects.get('Phone')
if obj:
    obj.location.z += 1.0
    obj.keyframe_insert(data_path='location', frame=1)
    obj.location.z -= 1.0
    obj.keyframe_insert(data_path='location', frame=60)
    obj.rotation_euler.z += 6.28318
    obj.keyframe_insert(data_path='rotation_euler', frame=60)
    print('Hover and rotation animation applied')
else:
    raise ValueError('Phone object not found')
